name: nhl-stat-ingestor
description: This app is a self contained node application that ingests data from th NHL Stats API and stores it in a local sqllite db.

scripts.migration:generate: wrap () { npx typeorm-ts-node-commonjs migration:generate ./src/orm/migrations/"$*" --timestamp --dataSource ./src/orm/data-source.ts --pretty | cat; }; wrap
scripts.migration:create: wrap () { npx typeorm-ts-node-commonjs migration:create ./src/orm/migrations/"$*" --timestamp | cat; }; wrap
scripts.entity:create: wrap () { npx typeorm-ts-node-commonjs entity:create ./src/orm/entities/"$*" | cat; }; wrap
